// ** React Imports import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // ** Custom Hooks import { useSkin } from '@hooks/useSkin' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Row, Col, CardTitle, CardText, Button, Form, Input } from 'reactstrap' // ** Styles import '@styles/react/pages/page-authentication.scss' const TwoStepsCover = () => { // ** Hooks const { skin } = useSkin() const illustration = skin === 'dark' ? 'two-steps-verification-illustration-dark.svg' : 'two-steps-verification-illustration.svg', source = require(`@src/assets/images/pages/${illustration}`).default return (
e.preventDefault()}>

Vuexy

Two Step Verification 💬 We sent a verification code to your mobile. Enter the code from the mobile in the field below. ******0789
e.preventDefault()}>
Type your 6 digit security code

Didn’t get the code?{' '} e.preventDefault()}> Resend {' '} or{' '} e.preventDefault()}> Call us

) } export default TwoStepsCover
